CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg. 11 reads: "Lovely, Lovely! - Mrs. Earl V. Hord stopped the show Friday night when she came out in this handsome blue evening gown loaned by Lane Bryant. Lacey top and lace motifs on the net skirt were featured.
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Rema Hord wearing eyeglasses and evening gown with sheer overlay, standing on stage with curtains and tree backdrop in A. Leo Weil school for Cotton on Parade fashion show
